dict.acceptation: 地面，地板；楼层；底部；议员席；

sent.orig: Compare earth, ground, floor and soil.
sent.trans: 将earth、 ground、 floor、 soil这几个词作一比较。

sent.orig: Apply DURASHINE Floor Polish after removing old wax polish with POWER OFF Floor floor.
sent.trans: 用特丽去蜡剂起清旧的蜡渍后，再用特丽新地板蜡水，令地板时刻晶莹洁净。

sent.orig: Use: all kinds of floor such as the resilient floor, epoxy floor, marble, granite, terrazzo.
sent.trans: 适用于：各种地面，如：弹性地板、环氧地面、水泥地面、水磨石表面、大理石表面、地砖表面等。

sent.orig: Theresults showed that all the 7 types of floor met the application requirements of floor.
sent.trans: 分析结果表明，七种地板试件均可满足地板的使用要求。

sent.orig: Floor Adhered with double-color patterned plastic floor tile.
sent.trans: 地板贴双色拼花塑胶地砖。
